testCases.label: Verify JavaScript number handling output
testCases.description: Executes the JavaScript function numberMethod() via JavascriptExecutor and asserts that the #output element displays the text 'Number: 3.14'.

testCases.label: Verify JavaScript undefined handling output
testCases.description: Calls undefinedMethod() in the page JavaScript and checks that the #output element renders the text 'Undefined: undefined'.

testCases.label: Verify JavaScript null handling output
testCases.description: Runs nullMethod() through JavascriptExecutor and asserts that the #output element shows the text 'Null: null'.

testCases.label: Verify JavaScript object handling output
testCases.description: Invokes objectMethod('John', 30) via JavascriptExecutor, waits until #output has the expected text, and then asserts it equals 'Object: {"name":"John","age":30}'.

testCases.label: Verify JavaScript array handling output
testCases.description: Calls arrayMethod() on the page and asserts that the #output element text is 'Array: [1,2,3,4,5]'.
